title.narrative: Strategic Sector Cooperation in Agriculture and Food Safety Between Denmark and Indonesia, Phase I

description.narrative:
Strategic Sector Cooperation in Agriculture and Food Safety Between Denmark and Indonesia, Phase I
Phase I of the cooperation will focus on: 1) the formulation of a policy framework in the development of organic milk in Indonesia; 2) the formulation of Indonesia's organic national standards that are comprehensive, in line with international standard and can be implemented especially for small-medium dairy farmers; 3) the implementation of standards and policies compiled in the form of development pilot projects organic milk in a potential dairy farmers cooperative; and 4) capacity building for government officials to implement good practices for organic dairy milk to increase farmer’s motivation and welfare.
Denmark is a frontrunner in innovative sustainable and effective food production, with extensive knowledge and technical solutions that Indonesia could benefit from.
